long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kill your boredom after a long scroll. Check out a new random cat fact or Chuck Norris joke every time you open up the popup. On every click of the extension the selected category will show you a new response. A quick break while you have been working tirelessly.
